code: import returnOrders from'../../models/orders';const initialState=returnOrders();export default function orderReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'db/orderAdded':{let{order}=action.payload;return state.concat(order);}default:return state;}}
